pages.text: You may stumble upon a $(l)Vault God Altar$() inside the Vault. Each one of the Vault God's has a different requirement to complete. $(br) $(li) Idona asks for mob kills $(li) Tenos asks for exp levels $(li) Wendarr asks for time $(li) Velara asks for health$() $(br2)The requirements are scaled to Vault Level.

When completing an altar, you either obtain the Vault God's $(l)Idol$() or the Vault Gods $(l)Blessing$(). The Vault Gods Blessing is used to craft an Idol in the $(l)Vault Forge$(). Additionally, there is a small chance of gaining a Vault God $(l)Favor$(), which is a positive buff that will be applied next vault. $(br2)Completing an altar is currently not affected by carrying the corresponding idol.
